source:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_00The leader of the Crystal Caravan is on the lookout for an experienced adventurer.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ルビーロード国際市場の人形劇団「ジドール」の座長は、新生祭の舞台公演について悩んでいるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_01Among the festive trappings of the Ruby Road Exchange you hear a voice call out to you, and upon turning to answer you see it belongs to an exotically dressed Lalafell. She introduces herself as the leader of the Crystal Caravan, a traveling puppet troupe. The group plans to mark the anniversary of the realm's rebirth by putting on a play depicting the Calamity, but the actor assigned the part of the Warrior of Light would like more information to fully bring his role to life. On top of that, the script the troupe has been given is proving less than helpful in determining how best to act. Desiring to host the most entertaining show possible, the troupe asks you to bring their would-be hero to the Quicksand, that he might hear Momodi's version of events and use her story to inform his performance.

※Please note that you will not be able to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

人形劇団「ジドール」の座長は、新生祭の目玉となる催しで、ある舞台を興行するという。有名な脚本家によって作成された「第七霊災」の物語を、さらに良い舞台にするため、「第七霊災」の取材の手伝いを依頼された。ウルダハのクイックサンドにいる「モモディ」と話し、劇団の看板俳優を紹介しよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_02<tab>Momodi is eager to share her recollections of the events of five years past, and laments that none can remember the faces or names of the Warriors of Light. She stresses that at the very least, the selflessness of their deeds should be remembered, and the Crystal Caravan's actor promises to live up to her request. The Quicksand proprietress suggests visiting Baderon at the Drowning Wench, so you might gain further knowledge of that fateful day.
target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_02<tab>モモディに劇団の看板俳優を紹介して、第七霊災の思い出を聞き出した。次は、リムサ・ロミンサの溺れた海豚亭にいる「バデロン」と話し、劇団の看板俳優を紹介しよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_03<tab>Baderon furrows his brow in an attempt to remember the events surrounding the Calamity, and recalls the day the Eorzean Alliance took to the battlefield under the specter of Dalamud. He tells of how the dreadwyrm Bahamut burst forth from the moon, blanketing the land with flame. The old pirate further says that although they faced certain doom, the troops fought on, until almost as suddenly as he appeared, the dragon vanished from the skies. Although no one knows exactly what happened, the realm was spared certain annihilation. The budding thespian is once again inspired, pledging to capture the heroism of the soldiers and the ferocity of Bahamut. Baderon suggests you ask one more person for their tale: Miounne at the Carline Canopy. Sensing that his muse is stirring, the actor departs for Gridania.
target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_03<tab>バデロンに劇団の看板俳優を紹介して、第七霊災の思い出を聞き出した。さらに、グリダニアのカーラインカフェにいる「ミューヌ」と話し、劇団の看板俳優を紹介しよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_04<tab>Miounne takes a more somber tone in her recollection, and at your companion's behest tells you of the Archon Louisoix. She says the man is much loved in Gridania, even now, and that he often worked together with the Warriors of Light. His sacrifice at the Battle of Carteneau is remembered by one and all, and Miounne's words encourage the Crystal Caravan star to immortalize the Archon's deeds on the stage. With his muse stirred from its slumber, the actor returns to Ul'dah, where he will commence rehearsing his role with a new fervor.
target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_04<tab>ミューヌに劇団の看板俳優を紹介して、第七霊災の思い出を聞き出した。劇団の看板俳優は、役作りの勘所を掴めたようだ。ウルダハのルビーロード国際市場にいる「劇団の座長」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_05<tab>The Crystal Caravan leader thanks you for your aid, but before you can leave the rest of the troupe appears with grave news: the star actor has been injured, and cannot take the stage. Crestfallen that they might miss an opportunity to perform, the troupe is about to give up when their leader is struck with a brilliant idea. She suggests that you take the stage in the injured actor's stead, a suggestion to which you readily agree. Although you are inexperienced, the ventriloquists assure you they can carry even the poorest acting. Steel yourself to give the performance of a lifetime, and speak with the Crystal Caravan leader once you are ready to begin preparations for the play.
target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_SEQ_05<tab>劇団の座長に、取材の報告をした。良い舞台になる手ごたえを感じたものの、劇団の看板俳優が負傷して、舞台に上がれなくなってしまった。なんとしても舞台の幕をあげたい劇団の座長は、主演の代役として冒険者を抜擢した。心の準備ができたら、「劇団の座長」に話しかけよう。冒険者は、舞台公演を成功させて、新生祭を盛り上げることができるだろうか……？

target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_TODO_00<tab>モモディと話す

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Baderon at the Drowning Wench.

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_000<tab>By the Twelve! You there! You have the gait and the looks of someone bound for greatness!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_000まっ、まぶしい！？
なんて、魅力煌めく冒険者さんでしょう！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_001<tab>I reckon you've already taken part in your fair share of daring deeds, exciting escapades, and astounding adventures! A worldly <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> such as yourself might even make an audience swoon, if only you were to try your hand at theater!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_001冒険者としても、さぞや活躍しておられるのでは？
役者でも大成できる、見事な輝きですわ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_002<tab>Believe me, I would know. I've spent the larger part of my life turning even the most ineloquent boors into masters of the stage, so I know immediately when I'm in the company of true talent. And you, my friend, have talent to spare!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_002あら失礼しました、私は人形劇団「ジドール」の座長ですの。
これまで、多くの原石をスターに育てあげましたから、
人の素質を見抜く眼力には、自信がありますのよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_003<tab>Who am I, you ask? Why, I'm the leader of the Crystal Caravan, the realm's premier puppet troupe. As it happens, I was just looking for an adventurer like you. You see, my leading man is having trouble finding the proper inspiration for his role. I was wondering if perhaps we might draw upon your worldly experience to give him a push in the proper direction.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_003実は……ちょうど腕利きの冒険者さんを探しておりましたの。
我が劇団の看板俳優が、役作りに悩んでおりまして、
「冒険者」の助けをお借りしたいのです。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_004<tab>Excellent, excellent! Then without further ado, let me introduce the rest of the troupe!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_004さあ、人形劇団「ジドール」一同は、こっちにいらっしゃい！
腕利きの冒険者の方が、いらっしゃったわ！
役作りの相談に、のってもらいましょう！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_005<tab>'Tis an honor to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>, and I hope our time together is fruitful. On the anniversary of our realm's rebirth, our troupe shall depict the tragic events of the Calamity. I shall play the role of the legendary adventurer─the Warrior of Light!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_005お初にお目に掛かります……。
僕が、この度、「第七霊災」を描いた人形劇で、
主演の「光の戦士」を務める俳優です。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_100_005<tab>You are doubtless thinking, “But I thought you were a puppet troupe!” Indeed we are, but we strive to set ourselves apart from the rest. I urge you to try and find another troupe as lively as ours! You shall not!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_100_005人形劇に、生身の役者がでるなぞ、驚かれたでしょう？
わが劇団は、これをウリに各地を巡業しておるのです。
ふぉふぉふぉ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_006<tab>Of course, the puppets still play a vital role. My partner and I provide the voices, endowing even the most crudely carved piece of wood with a personality of its own. I only hope you are able to provide our actor here with the inspiration to keep up with us.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_006そして、爺とわたしが、七つの声色を使い分け、
舞台上の人形に命を吹き込んでいる、声優です。
よろしくおねがいいたします。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_007<tab>Aye, a soulless performance is a shame to behold, but there'd be no show at all without puppets─or a stage! You can go ahead and thank me for those two indispensable elements. The audience may not see my face, but I appreciate their applause all the same!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_007板にあがる役者や、人形に命を吹き込む声優は大事だが、
この劇団の要は、なんといっても大道具のこの俺！
人形や舞台装置の制作から手入れまでしてるからな！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_008<tab>It is with this talented crew that I hope to move the hearts of Eorzea's people and win their acclaim!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_008こんな愉快な仲間たちで、新生祭の目玉であり、
第七霊災を振り返る、という重要な役目を担う公演を、
興行する予定なのです。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_009<tab>It has been our dream to perform a play which lingers in the minds of its viewers long after the curtain falls! Indeed, 'tis my hope that this production will be remembered for years to come!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_009劇団設立から目指していた大舞台の夢が、ついにかなうのです。
我が舞台人生のすべてを賭けて、成功させてみせますわ！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_010<tab>But of course, an ambitious concept is nothing without a first-rate script! Which is why we sought out Eorzea's foremost author of stories, poems, and songs to write it. However, the draft we've received from him is quite, shall we say, open to interpretation.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_010そこで私は、台本にも最高のクオリティを追求すべく、
多くの英雄叙事詩をヒットさせた話題の人物に依頼しましたの。
ところが……

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_011<tab>In fact, I'm not sure if I would call it a script at all. It's more of a...general outline of events. The others insist it's a work of genius, but I just can't see it...
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_011届いた台本ときたら、
大まかな流れが綴られているだけだったのです！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_012<tab>Madam, you must look past the words on the page! A play is a living thing, and the playwright has given us the opportunity to let our imaginations run wild. Stirring dramas are born from the reactions of the crowd, the passion of the actors, and yes, even the weather can make a performance more lively.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_012脚本家先生は、「舞台は生もの」とお考えなんじゃろう。
最高の舞台とは、天候や観客のノリなど、状況に合わせ、
臨機応変に演じて、初めて生まれるものですからな。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_013<tab>A stirring drama, yes. That is what we must deliver! To that end, my acting should be informed by knowledge─by the experiences of those who lived through the day firsthand. And who better than an adventurer to aid me in gathering such tales?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_013役者の力を信頼してくださるのは嬉しいのですが……
稽古するほど、どう演じるべきか迷いが大きくなるばかりで。
だから、第七霊災について、もっとよく知りたいのです。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_014<tab>I understand the proprietress of the Quicksand, Mistress Momodi, has a soft spot for adventurers like yourself. She likely has a wealth of stories to share. Good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, if you could ask her to regale our star with but a few, the Crystal Caravan would be in your debt.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_014ときに冒険者さん、モモディさんとお知り合いでしたら、
うちの看板俳優を紹介してやってくださいませんですかの？
ギルドの顔役であれば、多くの体験談を聞いておるでしょうから。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_015<tab>And they say adventurers only seek their own glory! You have our gratitude, friend! I reckon you might even put my puppets to shame, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_015よし、しっかりお話を聞いてこいよ！
その間に、舞台と人形の準備に、追い込みかけとくからよ！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_016<tab>Well then, let's be off, shall we? To the Quicksand!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_016では、冒険者さん、よろしくお願いいたします！
早速、「モモディ」さんのところへ向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_019<tab>With your help, we'll make a hero out of him yet!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_019どうぞ、あなたのお力で、うちの看板俳優を、
真の「英雄」に導いてやってくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_019<tab>So this is Mistress Momodi? Seeing her so hard at work fills me with determination. And...something else. Is this...? Ah, no, no, I cannot let myself get distracted. Come on, let's see what she has to say about the Calamity!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_019この方が、モモディさんですよね？
かわいらしくて、ずっと見ていられそうです。
ああ、はやくお話を聞いてみたいです。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_020<tab>Welcome, welcome! Come to celebrate the anniversary, have you? Couldn't have picked a better place, I say. What can I get for you?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_020あら、いらっしゃい……。
大切な新生祭の時期に、会いに来てくれてうれしいわ。
え、私に紹介したい人がいるですって？

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_021<tab>Greetings, Mistress Momodi. I am a humble actor of the Crystal Caravan, and we plan to celebrate this momentous day by retelling the story of the Calamity. I come before you to hear any stories you may have of that day, so I might draw upon them to inspire my performance.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_021初めまして、僕は人形劇団「ジドール」の役者です。
新生祭で興行する舞台の主題である、第七霊災について、
少しでもお話を伺えないものかと思いまして。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_022<tab>Well, ain't that somethin'! I'd be happy to oblige you, of course.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_022あら、色男さん、ごきげんよう。
役作りの取り組みも真剣そのものね。
ぜひとも、協力させて。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_023<tab>Let me see, let me think... Right, five years back, was it? I remember it like it were yesterday, the lesser moon comin' down hard, growin' bigger and redder by the moment.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_023第七霊災が起こったのは、5年前のこと……。
それまでお月様の周りを巡っていた、衛星「ダラガブ」が、
ここエオルゼアに落下してきたことで災厄が始まったの。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_024<tab>
target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_024<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_025<tab>Indeed, the moon burned as fiercely as the sun, and grew larger besides. Such a sight made many fear the end of the world was at hand, and rightly so.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_025確かに当時、僕たちは空を見上げては、
燃えるように輝く「ダラガブ」が日増しに大きくなるのを見て、
世の終わりだと怖れおののいたものです……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_026<tab>Makes me shudder even now to think of it. But not all of us were shiverin' in fear. There were those courageous few who fought on against the odds.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_026そう、私も未だに、あの時のことを思い出すと怖くなるわ。
でも、そんな絶望的な状況にあっても戦いつづけ、
破滅を阻止しようとした者たちがいた……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_027<tab>You speak of the Warriors of Light. Heroes worthy of song and celebration. Alas, none can remember what they look like, or even their names. 'Tis a shame, truly.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_027「光の戦士たち」と呼ばれる英雄ですね？
でも、僕たちは彼らについての記憶を失ってしまった。
「霊災の後遺症」でもある記憶の混乱によって……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_028<tab>Right, a damn shame. All the more reason why your play is important! Even if we can't remember them, we can't let 'em or what they did for us be forgotten.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_028だからこそ、あなたたちの公演に期待しているのよ。
「光の戦士たち」の名前や顔を忘れてしまったとしても、
彼らの想いや偉業は忘れていない、その感謝を表すためにね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_029<tab>Of course, Mistress Momodi! And thank you, for reminding me of the gravity of our responsibility. I shall do my utmost to ensure the memory of the Warriors of Light lives on!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_029ありがとうございます！
モモディさんの話を聞いて、責任の重さを実感しました。
必ずや、皆さんの夢や希望に繋がる英雄像を演じてみせます！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_030<tab>You call on Baderon over at the Drownin' Wench yet? Ought to if you haven't. I'm sure he'd be eager to speak with you─just remember to ask nicely!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_030そうそう、バデロンからは、もう話を聞いたの？
彼の話も役に立つと思うから、役者さんに紹介してあげて。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_031<tab>A brilliant suggestion! That settles it then! Let us away to Limsa Lominsa, and speak with this Baderon. Mistress Momodi, it has been a pleasure!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_031リムサ・ロミンサのバデロンさんも、ぜひ紹介してください！
では、一足先に向かっていますね！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_039<tab>Reckon there's more than a few with high expectations for this play of yours. I trust you lot won't let them down, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MOMODI_000_039誰もが、舞台で「英雄」を見れると期待しているわ。
大役だと思うから、看板俳優さんをよく手伝ってあげてね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_039<tab>So this is Baderon? He looks jovial enough. Come, let us see what he has to say.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_039お待ちしてましたよ！
バデロンさんは、こわもてなので心細かったんです……。
緊張しますが、引き下がるわけにはいきませんよね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_040<tab>Yer a festive-lookin' pair, ain't ye? If ye ask me, there's no better place to celebrate the anniversary o' the Calamity than right 'ere at the Drownin' Wench! Well then, what's yer poison?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_040おう、新生祭、楽しんでるか？
こんな時に会いにきてくれるとは、光栄だね。
なに、俺に紹介したい人がいるって？

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_041<tab>Greetings, Master Baderon. I've come seeking advice to aid in my own celebration of sorts: a stage reenactment of the very events this day commemorates. I would much appreciate if you could share with us any stories you might have.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_041バデロンさん、初めまして。
僕は新生祭の舞台公演で、主役の「光の戦士」を演じる役者です。
芝居の参考にするために、ぜひ当時の話を聞かせてください。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_042<tab>A reenactment, ye say!? Bugger me, that sounds like a grand idea! But afore I get to ramblin', I should warn ye my memory ain't what it used to be...
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_042驚いたな、アンタが新生祭公演の主役だって！？
確かにいいツラしてるが……
ちょっとばかし覚悟が足りないな。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_043<tab>I remember the whole lot of 'em Alliance boys an' girls marchin' off to Carteneau. Dalamud was 'angin' overhead like a sword 'bout to drop from the sky, an' there'd been talk about callin' upon the Twelve to stay its descent.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_043当時、光の戦士たちが参加したエオルゼア同盟軍は、
ダラガブの落下予想地点だったカルテノー平原に乗り込んだ。
十二神の力を借りて、ダラガブを押し返そうって作戦のためにな。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_044<tab>I can scarce imagine the fear they must have had to overcome, to set foot on a doomed battlefield.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_044今にも星が落ちてくるという場所に赴くとは、
いったい、どれほどの覚悟を必要としたことか……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_045<tab>'Twasn't a task for the faint of 'eart, goin' toe-to-toe with the Garleans beneath the blood red moon. Every man an' woman what fought that day's deservin' of our respect.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_045作戦に参加してくれた、すべての者に感謝しないとな……。
だが、彼らにとっての危険は、頭上に迫る衛星だけじゃなかった。
同盟軍を妨害しようと、帝国軍が待ち受けていたのさ……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_046<tab>Wasn't there meself, o' course, but the survivors said that naught could be 'eard over roar of the battle. That is, till Dalamud burst open an' that thrice-damned bastard of a dragon Bahamut showed 'imself.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_046両軍が正面から激突して、すさまじい戦いになったそうだ。
そして、その激戦の最中にダラガブが空中で崩壊して、
黒い翼を持つ、古の蛮神「バハムート」が現れたのさ！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_047<tab>Bahamut, the primal that set Eorzea aflame. No matter their strength in numbers, how could anyone hope to win against such an enemy?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_047エオルゼア全土に、災いの炎を振りまいたあの蛮神ですね？
……今なお残る爪痕が、その力の強大さを物語っています。
あんな存在に、勝てる気がしませんよ……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_048<tab>They couldn't. But then, just as they were all bracin' to be burned to cinders, the dragon up an' disappears in a flash o' blindin' light. Ain't a soul alive who knows the 'ow or why of it.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_048ところがどっこい、古の蛮神は忽然と姿を消しちまった……。
そこで何が起きたのか、詳しく知る者はいない……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_049<tab>I see... Master Baderon, you have my thanks for sharing your story! I shall do my utmost to ensure that our audience remembers the bravery of the soldiers that day. Ohhh... Knowing the full weight of my responsibility makes me all the more nervous!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_049貴重なお話を、ありがとうございます……。
自分が演じる英雄の偉大さに、今更ながら震えています。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_050<tab>Some might say that's a good thing! Anyroad, I ain't the only one ye ought to be askin' about that day. I'm sure Miounne of the Carline Canopy'd be 'appy to tell ye a tale or two.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_050ははっ、でも、良い顔つきになってきたぜ？
そうだ、グリダニアのミューヌからも話を聞いてみろよ。
森都には、第七霊災時に活躍した賢人が滞在していたからな。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_051<tab>Of course. One can never have too much inspiration! Adventurer, let us depart to the Carline Canopy at once. Master Baderon, thank you again!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_051それは、興味深いですね！
冒険者さん……「ミューヌ」さんのところに伺いましょう！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_059<tab>That one certainly doesn't want for passion, eh? I'll 'ave to try and see if I can't make my way to Ul'dah and see this play in person.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_BADERON_000_059エオルゼアを今に導いてくれた「光の戦士たち」が、
看板俳優を通して、未来への力を与えてくれるんだろうな。
英雄ってやつは、本当にありがたい存在だぜ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_059<tab>I must say, if I had the time I'd be inclined to spend more than a few nights here. Unfortunately, we have no such luxury─we must remain focused on the task at hand! Now, let's speak with Miounne and see what she has to say.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_059ここは、居心地がよくて、長居したくなってしまいますね。
ですが、私には舞台稽古が待ってます。
急いで、お話を聞かせてもらいましょう。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_060<tab>In looking to the past, we take solace in the present, and think of what the future may hold... Ah, pray forgive me. At this time of year, one cannot help but wax poetic. How may I be of service?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_060過去を偲び、今を喜び、未来を想う……。
新生祭の季節になると、身が引き締まる思いがするね。
おや、僕に会わせたい人がいるのかい？

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_061<tab>It is an honor to make your acquaintance, Mistress Miounne. I have been tasked with portraying the storied Warriors of Light in a play which will commemorate the events of the Calamity. If you would be so kind to tell me of the Archon Louisoix─a resident of this very city I believe─I would be grateful!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_061ミューヌさん、ごきげんよう。
僕は新生祭の舞台公演で、光の戦士役を拝命した役者です。
役作りのために、ぜひ賢人の話を伺いたいのですが……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_062<tab>Archon Louisoix? Indeed he resided here in Gridania. His sacrifice during the Battle of Carteneau is something we shall never forget.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_062あぁ、賢人ルイゾワのことだね？
ここグリダニアに滞在し、エオルゼアを危機から救うために、
力を尽くしてくれた、まさに大恩人だよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_063<tab>Perhaps if you were to tell me more of him and his relationship with the Warriors of Light...
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_063はい、その賢人ルイゾワの話を通じて、
「光の戦士たち」の実像に迫りたいのです！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_064<tab>Oh, he had worked closely with the Warriors of Light, even before Carteneau, and on that fateful day he took charge of the Alliance forces, they did not hesitate to fight under his command.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_064なるほどね、確かに彼と英雄の接点はたくさんあったよ。
軍師としてエオルゼア同盟軍に招かれていた賢人ルイゾワは、
多くの戦いで英雄を導き、ともに戦っていたのだもの。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_065<tab>Had they not been there to hold back the relentless assault of the imperial army, many believe that Master Louisoix would have not even had the time to beseech the Twelve for aid.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_065賢人ルイゾワが、帝国軍との激戦の中で、
十二神の力を召喚する「神降ろし」の儀式をやり遂げたのも、
「光の戦士たち」が協力していたからだと言われているよ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_066<tab>Alas, in the end, both the Archon and those brave heroes gave their lives in our defense. Though we can never thank them enough, during this solemn time we must honor their sacrifice.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_066それなのに、賢人も英雄たちも、
カルテノーの戦いを最後に、消息を絶ってしまった……。
だからこそ、彼らに対する感謝の念を、新生祭で伝えないとね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_067<tab>To honor the bond that Louisoix and the Warriors of Light shared, and to commemorate their brave deeds, I pledge to bare my soul on the stage! Just as they risked their lives in the fighting, so too shall I act as if my life depends on it!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_067賢人と英雄たちの固い絆……そして、彼らが成し遂げた偉業……。
この感動と感謝の気持ちを、舞台で表現したい……！
英雄が命がけで戦ったように、僕も命を懸けて英雄を演じます。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_068<tab>Then I am certain you will receive a standing ovation!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_MIOUNNE_000_068うん、その気迫があれば、
きっと見る者の心を動かすはずさ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_069<tab>You have my sincerest gratitude, Mistress Miounne. As do you, adventurer. I feel my muse stirring at last! It's time to rehearse, rehearse, rehearse! Adventurer, pray inform the others that I shall set to work at once!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_069ミューヌさん、冒険者さん、ありがとうございました！
僕は、大急ぎでウルダハに戻って、稽古に励みます！
冒険者さん、座長に報告をお願いできますか？

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_079<tab>I must say, I am quite eager to see what sort of play they put on. Look for me in the crowd!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHERO_000_079看板俳優さんは、英雄の勘所を掴めたようだね。
どんな光の戦士を舞台で見せてくれるんだろう……。
これは、見逃せないね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_080<tab>Welcome back! It appears your research was certainly a success! Our future Warrior of Light set to rehearsing most enthusiastically.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_080お帰りなさい……！
どうやらウチの看板俳優は、最後の稽古に入ったようですね。
英雄像を掴めたようで、なによりですわ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_081<tab>I owe you my thanks, good adventurer, for introducing us to such colorful and knowledgeable characters!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_081それもこれも、貴方が冒険者ギルドの顔役たちに、
引き合わせてくださったおかげ……ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_082<tab>Now, we must begin preparations! Of course, we've prepared a space for you as the guest of honor. May the tale of the Calamity bring tears to your eyes and warmth to your heart.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_082この様子でしたら、初演も安心して見ていられそうです。
貴方のために、特等席を用意しますので、
どうぞ、私たちの舞台を観劇していってください。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_083<tab>Chief, the bloody beam, it fell right on top of him! Gods be good!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_083座長、大変だ！！
舞台稽古で事故が起きて、ウチの大事な看板俳優が！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_084<tab>Him!? What beam!?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_084なっ、なんですって！？
いったい、どんな事故でしたの！？

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_085<tab>Our lead was rehearsing the Battle of Carteneau─most passionately, I might add─when he knocked one of the puppets into an unstable beam, which then fell over and knocked him off the stage. He'll recover with time, but only the Twelve know when he'll be fit for theatrics!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_085稽古に熱が入りすぎて、人形たちとぶつかって、
その弾みで、舞台から転げ落ちてしまったの……。
あの怪我じゃ、とてもじゃないけど初演は無理ね。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_086<tab>Heavens forfend! Just when I thought our problems had been solved... To think his newfound passion was what led to this...
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_086なんてことですの……せっかく、悩みも解消されたというのに。
いえ、長く悩んだ英雄像を、ようやく掴んだからこそ、
稽古に熱が入ってしまったのね……。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_087<tab>Although it grieves me greatly, I see no choice but to postpone our show. It would seem fate does not favor us today. <sigh> ...I'll go and break the sad news to the public...
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_087主役不在では、さすがに幕は開けられまい……。
劇団の名を高める好機じゃったが、これもまた運命……。
残念じゃが、公演の延期を発表するしかあるまい。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_088<tab>W-Wait, I just thought of something! We have an adventurer right here, don't we? And one with no small amount of talent!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_088……いいえ、できる……できるわ……！
目の前にいるじゃない、千年にひとりの逸材が！！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_089<tab>Yes, you can channel your own experiences and bring the heroics of the Warriors of Light to life! The more I look at you, the surer of it I become!
target: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_089<tab>貴方ほどの冒険者なら、第七霊災を救った英雄も演じられるわ！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_090<tab>Madam, I believe you may be on to something. Of course, it stands to reason that an actual adventurer would be most suited to play the role of one. Why did we not see it before?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNMENTOR_000_090確かに……座長がいうなら、間違いないでしょうな。
腕利きの冒険者が演じるとあれば、
真に迫る英雄が見れそうじゃのう。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_091<tab>Can we really expect a novice to move the audience? Still, I must admit I would rather not disappoint our fans.
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_091やれやれ、惚れ込んだら止まらない……
座長の悪い癖が、また始まったようね。
でも、人々の期待を裏切るわけにもいかないわ。

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_092<tab>And I suppose greatness does sometimes spring from improvisation. Yes... Perhaps we have a chance after all! Besides, our voices should be able to carry the performance. So, what say you? Will you take the stage?
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEEL_000_092出たとこ勝負も、望むところよ。
私たち裏方が、精いっぱい貴方の演技に合わせるわ！
だから、いつもどおりに振る舞ってくれれば大丈夫！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_093<tab>Well now that that's settled, I'll get the puppets and the stage ready. No more falling beams─you have my word!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNFLYMAN_000_093よっしゃ、そうと決まりゃ、舞台の準備のやりなおしだ！
最高の演技ができるように、用意しとくぜ！！

source: TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_094<tab>Feeling a bit of stage fright, eh? Worry not, my friend, my troupe is more than capable of bringing even the most wooden performance to life. Just act from the heart, and I'm sure you'll impress. Well then, whenever you're ready, just let me know! Until then!
target:
TEXT_FESANV201_02329_NEWBORNHEAD_000_094ウチのベテラン役者たちが、徹底的にフォローしますから、
貴方は、心のままに英雄を演じてくだされば結構ですわ！
舞台に上がる覚悟が決まったら、声をかけてくださいね。
